item.description:
Boston Harbor Cruise, July 26thANNUAL BOSTON HARBOR SINGLES CRUISE
JULY 26th, SAVE THE DATE!
HAWAIIAN LUAU
Saturday, July 26th...
5 p.m. Bon Voyage Party
7 - 10 Cruise & Dance.

Reservations are now being accepted!

EARLY BIRD TICKETS ARE ON SALE UNTIL MAY 1st.
Tickets are $30 each or '4 for $100'.
After May 31st these are the prices:
June Price is $35 each, 3 for $100
July Price is $40 each, 2 for $75.

BEAT THE CLOCK!
Sen d your check today to:
Singles Network
6 Deerfield Rd.
Hingham, MA 02043

Please include the names and addresses for each ticket with phone numbers.
Questions? Call 781-446-0234 or email singlesexec222@comcast.net
website: www.se-4u.com

Tickets will be mailed out sometime the end of June or the first of July with all the details of our Bon Voyage Party, directions and parking information.

We had great time on this cruise last year!!
It turned out to be a beautiful night on the water.
We had over 300 singles dancing the night away. Many started at The Rock Revolution Bar for drinks and hors d'oeurves and several continued to party there and at The Times Bar. Go to our website: www.se-4u.com and see the pictures.

BUY YOUR TICKETS TODAY...FORWARD TO ALL YOUR SINGLE FRIENDS.
item.name: Boston Harbor Cruise
